plot: An young female luchador aspiring to be like her hero must learn to accept her flaws when she faces a terrifying opponent.
title: The Legend of the Flying Tomato

original_name: The Legend of the Flying Tomato
plot_en: An young female luchador aspiring to be like her hero must learn to accept her flaws when she faces a terrifying opponent.
